attributes.action: No covid-19 vaccine identification needed to live normally (work, travel, shop)
attributes.additional_details: We live in democracy, our freedom of speech as humans should not be taken away from us. Every individual has the right to decide for themselves if they want to inject themselves with a covid-19 vaccine or not. It should be a choice. Neither indirect forcing individuals to get vaccinated by excluding them from anything that was seen as ‘normal’ before the ‘new normal’ occured. A vaccine should be a CHOICE because if not, that’s where democracy ends
attributes.background: NO to mandatory covid-19 vaccine identifications made compulsary to travel/enter shops/attend events or anything that included our ‘normal’ before the pandemic. Freedom of choice to every individual regarding the covid-19 vaccine.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
